description:
Download this app to read the popular Sagħtar magazine! A whole archive of more than 360 editions for free from 1971 until the current issues. 

The app also has a number of new features and activities, including an audio section in which you can read and listen to stories, poems and articles, and much more! 

Follow the instructions in this page to download and install. The same login and password created for website saghtar.org.mt can be used.

This is an app by Fondazzjoni Sagħtar VO/1824 within the Malta Union of Teachers. 

This project has been funded through the Voluntary Organisations Project Scheme (VOPS) managed by the Malta Council for the Voluntary Sector.

Stay informed with the Times of Malta app, your go-to source for trusted news, analysis, and exclusive content. As Malta’s oldest and most respected news outlet, we are the pulse of the nation, and your trusted source of journalism on-the-go.

Key Features:
- Notifications on Important Updates: Stay informed on significant news and topics, not just breaking stories
- Exclusive Content: Access premium articles, opinion pieces, and investigative reports
- Dark Mode: Experience a comfortable reading experience for low-light conditions
- Accessibility Options: Ensure an inclusive reading experience with adjustable text sizes, and more
- Save articles to read at your convenience

Once you register & subscribe you will be able to...
- Comment on articles
- Get Unlimited Access to Articles: Enjoy unrestricted reading of all of our content, anytime, anywhere
- E-Paper Access: Stay connected with the digital replica of our printed newspaper
- Use Puzzles: Access a variety of puzzles to challenge your mind and relax
- Listen to exclusive articles on our app, perfect for on-the-go news consumption
- Read Offline: Access cached or saved articles and downloaded editions anytime, anywhere, even without an internet connection
- Receive subscriber-only newsletters from our Editors
- Enjoy preferential invitations to exclusive events
- Attend 1-Hour Sessions with Editors and Journalists: Engage with our newsroom in exclusive monthly sessions

Why Choose Times of Malta?
With a 90-year legacy of delivering high-quality journalism, we are committed to keeping you informed, inspired, and connected to the world around you. To continue to deliver trusted, reliable, and informative news, we’ve decided to launch a subscription model as independent journalism costs money. 

Download Now
Discover a smarter way to stay updated. Download the Times of Malta app today and experience the power of personalized, trustworthy news in the palm of your hand.

Privacy Policy: https://timesofmalta.com/privacy-statement
Terms of Use: https://timesofmalta.com/terms-and-conditions

Brainometry - Master Mathematics Through Interactive Learning Transform the way you learn mathematics. Brainometry is a comprehensive learning platform designed for students aged 10-16, offering interactive problem-solving, visual explanations, and adaptive practice across all essential math topics. 

COMPLETE MATH CURRICULUM Master 10 comprehensive topics covering middle school mathematics:
- Algebra: Variables, expressions, and algebraic manipulation
- Geometry: Shapes, angles, area, and volume
- Fractions: Operations, simplification, and conversions
- Decimals: Arithmetic operations and place value
- Percentages: Calculations and real-world applications
- Ratios and Proportions: Scaling and relationships
- Exponents and Powers: Laws and scientific notation
- Equations: Linear equations and problem-solving
- Word Problems: Real-world mathematical reasoning
- Statistics: Data analysis, mean, median, and graphs

Silenza – Your Daily Moment of Stillness 
Find peace in silence.
Silenza invites you to pause for just one minute each day — no movement, no sound, no distractions.
If you stay completely still and silent, you’ll unlock a new serene illustration from the World of Calm collection.
 
Each day adds to your streak and opens a new piece of tranquil beauty — a quiet motivation to return, breathe, and simply be.
 
Key Features:
• 60-second “moment of silence” sessions
• Motion, sound, and touch detection for full mindfulness immersion
• Daily streak tracker to keep your calm routine
• Unlockable collection of peaceful illustrations
• Minimalist, atmospheric design
• Gentle animations and sounds for inner balance
 
Embrace silence. Discover stillness. Unlock peace with Silenza.

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

Nepali Christian App - Agape App - Your Ultimate Companion for Spiritual Growth and Connection

Discover a digital experience with the Agape App, designed to empower your spiritual journey through various resources and tools. Whether you're seeking to deepen your faith, find inspiration, or connect with a vibrant Christian community, Agape App is your go-to platform. With a seamless blend of offline access to the Nepali Bible, Nepali Khristiya Bhajan with chords, daily Bible verses, insightful devotions, eBooks, uplifting Christian songs, and enlightening videos, Agape App caters to all your spiritual needs.

Key Features:
--------------
1. Nepali Bible with Audio: Carry the word of God with you wherever you go, even without an internet connection. Access the complete Nepali Holy Bible anytime with useful features like bookmark, highlight, note, and social sharing.

2. Nepali Khristiya Bhajan with Chords: Get your favourite Nepali Khristiya Bhajan accompanied by chords and audio. You can mark your favourite songs, watch related videos, listen to the audio, and create your own songlist to share with others.

3. Daily Bible Verse: Kickstart your day with a powerful dose of spirituality. Receive a new and enlightening Bible verse each day to meditate upon, inspiring you to live each moment in accordance with God's teachings.

4. Devotions: Dive deeper into your relationship with God through thoughtful devotions. These curated readings provide insights, reflections, and practical applications of Biblical principles to guide you in your daily life.

5. eBooks: Explore a curated collection of eBooks on spirituality, faith, and personal growth by Nepali Writers. Immerse yourself in profound writings that offer guidance, wisdom, and perspectives to enhance your spiritual journey.

6. Christian Songs and Videos: Lift your spirits with an array of Christian songs that celebrate faith, hope, and love. Additionally, watch inspiring videos that cover a range of varieties like songs, testimonies, teachings, and more.

7. Artist Directory: Browse through various Nepali Christian artists and writers in a single place and browse through their contributions.
  
8. Personalized Experience: Tailor your experience by bookmarking and highlighting favorite verses, marking favourite songs, creating songlists, and sharing them. Take notes during sermons and readings, and easily access the content that resonates with you. Also, you can sync all your personal data on multiple devices.

Download the Agape App and embark on a journey of your spiritual growth!

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

Discover the joy of reading with Magibook - the app that changes books to match your reading level. Perfect for beginners, English learners, parents, children, and anyone who wants to enjoy books more easily.

What Magibook Offers:

•Makes Books Easier: Every book comes in four reading levels.
•Lots of Books: Read many different books, from philosophy to literary classics.
•Helps You Learn English: Great for ESL, EFL, IELTS, and TOEFL
•Good for Kids: Many valuable books can now readable by children.
•Special features for dyslexia, ADHD, and other reading challenges
•Easy-to-Use Dictionary: Learn new words as you read.
•See Your Progress: Watch how your reading gets better over time. 

For English Learners: 
Improve your English through reading. Start easy and progress to harder books. Boost vocabulary, grammar, and comprehension with famous books in simpler language. Great for IELTS and TOEFL preparation.

For Parents: 
Help your children love reading with age-appropriate books that grow with them. Improve literacy and develop a lifelong passion for literature.

For Everyone: 
We make difficult books simpler, so everyone can enjoy great literature regardless of reading challenges. Perfect for those with dyslexia or ADHD.

Why Choose Magibook?

•Personalized reading experience
•Encourages lifelong reading habits
•Improves English skills for ESL/EFL learners
•Supports special education needs
•Makes classic literature accessible
•Aids in exam preparation
•Provides graded readers for improvement
•Offers abridged versions of complex texts
•Enhances vocabulary and grammar
•Improves reading comprehension and speed 

Available Books: Magibook offers a wide range of famous books at different reading levels, including:

"Don Quixote" by Miguel de Cervantes, "War and Peace" by Leo Tolstoy, "Pride and Prejudice" by Jane Austen, "Les Miserables" by Victor Hugo, "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald, "Crime and Punishment" by Fyodor Dostoevsky, "Moby Dick" by Herman Melville, "The Republic" by Plato, "Wealth of Nations" by Adam Smith, "The Ethics of Aristotle" by Aristotle, "Jane Eyre" by Charlotte Brontë, "Ulysses" by James Joyce, "Great Expectations" by Charles Dickens, "The Brothers Karamazov" by Fyodor Dostoevsky, "The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin" by Benjamin Franklin, "On Liberty" by John Stuart Mill, "The Count of Monte Cristo" by Alexandre Dumas, "Meditations" by Marcus Aurelius, "The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes" by Arthur Conan Doyle, "Kim" by Rudyard Kipling.

From philosophy to adventures, from romances to mysteries, Magibook brings you the best books in a way you can enjoy.

With Magibook, you can:

•Read classic novels at your level
•Improve English vocabulary and grammar
•Prepare for language tests
•Help children develop reading skills
•Make reading easier with dyslexia or ADHD
•Explore philosophy and complex ideas
•Enjoy literature in simplified English
•Track reading progress
•Use an integrated dictionary
•Find books matching your reading level 

Suitable for all language levels: A1 (Beginner), A2 (Elementary), B1, B2(intermediate), C1 (advanced), or C2 (proficiency).

Don't let difficult books hold you back. With Magibook, you can read anything. From beginner level to advanced literature, from children's stories to philosophical works. It's like having a reading tutor, dictionary, and vast library in one app.

Upgrade to Magibook Unlimited - our premium subscription giving you unlimited access to our entire digital book library and premium features, plus be first to access new book releases and reading tools as they launch. Not ready to subscribe? Try Magibook with our selection of free classic books.

Unlock your reading potential with Magibook - where every book is the right book for you.

Our mission is to increase accessibility to knowledge, understanding, and shared wisdom.

Install Magibook today, for free!

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES

*Digital edition of Caixin Weekly
For decision-makers and management in the fields of finance, economy, industry, and investment, it focuses on financial information in the economic, financial, industrial and other social fields, focuses on reform and opening up, is based on financial information, and provides objective and timely exclusive reports, in-depth investigations, and authoritative analyses.

*Financial News
It provides accurate and timely records of the rise and fall of important figures in the financial sector and insightful analyses of the forces that dominate the fate of figures and drive financial events. Updated every weekday, with no limit on breaking news.

Caixin Time" is a high-profile video programme featuring conversations with global political, business and academic figures. Exclusive interviews with domestic and foreign dignitaries such as Kissinger, Lee Hsien Loong, Carrie Lam Cheng Yuet-ngor, and Lou Jiwei; famous entrepreneurs such as Musk, Wang Shi, Lei Jun, Liu Qiangdong, Dong Mingzhu, Cao Dewang, Li Shufu, and Zhang Chaoyang; and senior economists such as Wu Jinglian, Zhu Min, Summers, and Stiglitz.

*Friday at 7pm
An audio programme at 7pm every Friday night, bringing together the key news analyses of the week, and seeing the big trends in the big events.

*Caixin's vision is presented by Caixin.
The programme uses the camera to freeze moments and create images for the times. Each issue features a combination of 6-8 pages of photographs to present life in all its forms.
